titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (S. 2840) to provide for the designation and conservation of certain lands in the State of Arizona and Idaho, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1096.
Called up by House by Rule.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 224 - 124 (Record Vote No: 452).

bill.summary: 10/19/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 2840 (Arizona and Idaho lands).
